DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect post-operative ROM Flex IM rod Rigid IM rod , collect bone morphology Japanese low extremity research incidence overhung Flex IM rod .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient sign Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approve , study specific Informed Patient Consent Form . 2 . Patient male nonpregnant female age 20 year old . 3 . Patient candidate primary Total Knee Arthroplasty ( TKA ) . 4 . Patient whose preoperative range motion ( ROM ) 110 degree . 5 . Patient willing able comply postoperative schedule clinical radiographic evaluation rehabilitation . 1 . Revision case 2 . Patients use bone wedge allograft due bone loss . 3 . Patient Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 40 . 4 . Patient active suspect latent infection affect knee joint time study device implantation . 5 . Patient neuromuscular neurosensory deficiency , limit ability evaluate safety efficacy device . 6 . Patient diagnose systemic disease ( e.g . Lupus Erythematosus ) metabolic disorder ( e.g . Paget 's Disease ) lead progressive bone deterioration . 7 . Patient immunologically suppress receive steroid excess normal physiological requirement ( e.g . > 30 day ) . 8 . Patient fail unicondylar knee prosthesis . 9 . Patient known sensitivity device material . 10 . Patient inappropriate participate study judgment investigator .
